meanings.definition: In a gradual manner; slowly or by degrees.
meanings.sent1: She started to feel better gradually after taking the medicine.
meanings.sent2: The sun set gradually, painting the sky with beautiful colors.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise challenged the hare to a race, knowing it would win gradually.
meanings.sent4: Time passed gradually, like sand slipping through an hourglass.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed gradually, revealing their vibrant colors to the world.
